description: metal bank in the form of a banede trunk; coin slot in top; window on front and lever on side; number of dimes recorded in window; remnant of paper label on back;
inscription:
Inscriptions; Label 

on top near coin slot:[dime]
on bottom, stamped into metal:[PAT. MARCH/18,1888]; [THE/ H&H/ REGISTERING/SAVINGS BANK]; [PAT./ JUNE 12, 1888];

on bottom in red:[illegible]
on bottom in white: [S H N]
title: "Phoenix Dime Register Trunk" still bank
